## Bio

Vishal Katti analyzes personnel safety, process safety, health and environmental performance metrics
at ExxonMobil Services & Technology Pvt. Ltd. His focus is on identifying patterns and extracting key learnings for 
business leaders to act on. He strives to streamline and automate data stewardship activities. 
He resides in Bengaluru, India with his wife and 3yo daughter, but constantly longs for Goa where he spent most of his childhood.
